channel.title: ~BlooD RagE Development Team, Staff Needed~
channel.description:
[size=11pt][u]-BlooD RagE Development Team-[/u][/size] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]What I'm Doing[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I'm starting a development team for a new server, I'm tired of seeing so many of those unedited Phonescape AND Pimpscape servers. So I am starting my own server, AGAIN... Currently I'm hosting a Pwnm30rdi3scape on my dedicated server (still a work in progress). I plan on making this server 100% from scratch and it will have no lag, yes i will host it on my dedicated server. Now if you think I'm a noob or if you think this will be a noob development team, you are wrong. Do NOT post here if whats all your going to do is "Spam". ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]Programming and Hosting[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The server will be programmed by java and java only. This server will be hosted on my Red hat core 7 dedicated server. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]Goals[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ -Every or almost all skills working -Full specials -NPC training -Lots of shops -Much more will be added shortly... ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]Website and Forums[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I will buy a Domain name and i will host the domain on my dedicated server. The forums will be made with my payed version of Vbulletin. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]How to sign up/ Application[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[b]IRL Name:[/b] [b]Age[/b]: [b]Experience[/b]: [b]Job Wanted[/b]: [b]How long have you been programming with java:[/b] [b]Msn or Yahoo[/b]: [b]Why[/b]: [b]Forum And In Game Name[/b]: [b]Favorite Color[/b]: [b]Do you have any pets[/b]:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]Jobs Available[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Programming/ Codding: (Same thing - FULL) -Pwnm30rdi3 -X Dan X -xx qwertyuiop xx -LeScape Client Programming and Cache Work: (FULL) -Pwnm30rdi3 -xx qwertyuiop xx Mini Games/ Quests: (FULL) -LeScape -Moparclient Webclient Work: (Three spaces left) - - - InGame Mods: (FULL) -Fuzzy Ranqe -Goddess Forum Mods: (One space left) -coder 2k8 - Handlers & Skills: (FULL) -Pwnm30rdi3 -xx qwertyuiop xx Forums & Website: (FULL) -si force -Syrillia -ddsowns ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=9pt]Contact Me[/size][/b] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ MSN: LOOK IN MY PROFILE! Or you may PM me!

item.title: ~BlooD RagE Development Team, Staff Needed~
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

[quote=“Runer King, post:138, topic:173068”][quote author=pwnm30rdi3 link=topic=233300.msg1994665#msg1994665 date=1200265475]
[size=11pt]-BlooD RagE Development Team-[/size]

                 [b][size=9pt]What I'm Doing[/size][/b]

I’m starting a development team for a new server, I’m tired of seeing so many of those unedited Phonescape AND Pimpscape servers. So I am starting my own server, AGAIN… Currently I’m hosting a Pwnm30rdi3scape on my dedicated server (still a work in progress). I plan on making this server 100% from scratch and it will have no lag, yes i will host it on my dedicated server. Now if you think I’m a noob or if you think this will be a noob development team, you are wrong. Do NOT post here if whats all your going to do is “Spam”.

             [b][size=9pt]Programming and Hosting[/size][/b]

The server will be programmed by java and java only. This server will be hosted on my Red hat core 7 dedicated server.

                        [b][size=9pt]Goals[/size][/b]

-Every or almost all skills working
-Full specials
-NPC training
-Lots of shops
-Much more will be added shortly…

             [b][size=9pt]Website and Forums[/size][/b]

I will buy a Domain name and i will host the domain on my dedicated server.
The forums will be made with my payed version of Vbulletin.

            [b][size=9pt]How to sign up/ Application[/size][/b]

IRL Name:
Age:
Experience:
Job Wanted:
How long have you been programming with java:
Msn or Yahoo:
Why:
Forum And In Game Name:
Favorite Color:
Do you have any pets:

                 [b][size=9pt]Jobs Available[/size][/b]

Programming/ Codding: (Same thing - FULL)
-Pwnm30rdi3
-X Dan X
-xx qwertyuiop xx
-LeScape

Client Programming and Cache Work: (FULL)
-Pwnm30rdi3
-xx qwertyuiop xx

Mini Games/ Quests: (FULL)
-LeScape
-Moparclient

Webclient Work: (Three spaces left)

InGame Mods: (FULL)
-Fuzzy Ranqe
-Goddess

Forum Mods: (One space left)
-coder 2k8

Handlers & Skills: (FULL)
-Pwnm30rdi3
-xx qwertyuiop xx

Forums & Website: (FULL)
-si force
-Syrillia
-ddsowns

                   [b][size=9pt]Contact Me[/size][/b]

MSN: Coolmanawesome1@hotmail.com

Or you may PM me!
[/quote]
Check the rules. Your post breaks 2.

Posting Development team ads.
Posting emails. (They can click the thing next to your name for it.)

Enjoy, reported about 8 times.[/quote]

I just added the thing on my name 2 days ago and this thread is 1 week old…

Also your not aloud to report someone more than 1 time, Personally i do not like tadle tales like you because they are immature fags… many other people do this same thing and that is not an ad!

I changed it for you, N00B ikiliki has already posted on this thread so you would think that ilkiliki would have read the first page u mod wanna be. You will never get mod!

Read full topic
